resources.string: This application is useful for circumventing carrier-imposed restrictions on tethering/mobile hotspot mode. It enables you to configure a network interface so that all packets leaving via that interface will have the same TTL (time-to-live) value, which may or may not be enough to defeat your carrier\'s tethering detection system.\n\nSet new TTL:
Are you sure you want to modify TTL on selected interface?

Copyright © 2014 Kirn Gill <segin2005@gmail.com>.

Additional thanks to:

Mattis Michel: Advice, API help
Daniel Strand (m4dh4x0r): Debugging, testing
Raj Rajan: Testing
Elvis Mongaré: Testing, Dutch translation
TTLEditor requires BusyBox, either distributed as part of your ROM or from the installer app on Google Play on any rooted device.\n\nWould you like to install BusyBox from Google Play now?
Your device does not have root access! TTL Editor will not function on your device.
Your devices does not have a working \"iptables\" binary. TTL Editor will not function on your device.
TTL Editor was not granted root access!
